page.name: Take a Survey
page.text: Please take a minute of your time to fill out a survey on the swiki: -Edit this page. -Insert your survey's name below in regular swiki fashion. -Save the page. -Create the page by clicking on 'create', next to your survey's name. -Fill out the survey. !Surveys -*11* !How is this Done? -Check out *6*. It explains how to use schemes and forms to make pages created from this page have the "survey" text form.
